entry.title: When & When NOT to use だ (vs だね vs だな vs だよ)

media:group.media:title: When & When NOT to use だ (vs だね vs だな vs だよ)
media:group.media:description:
Support Misa on Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/japaneseammo
Have you made a mistake of saying "kawaii DA", "kakkoii DA"...? Using だ correctly will instantly help you sound like a native Japanese speaker!!
だ vs である vs です
We will also learn how to use: だね だよ だな

entry.title: the CORRECT ways to say "AND/ALSO" in Japanese とか, し, たり, で, そして, と, も, あと, や

media:group.media:title: the CORRECT ways to say "AND/ALSO" in Japanese とか, し, たり, で, そして, と, も, あと, や
media:group.media:description:
Try Exercises/mini tests on Patreon - https://bit.ly/3KpDKeF
The Katakana blanket on the chair :3 - https://bit.ly/3BXr8cG Hiragana blanket - https://bit.ly/3pe1RmT
In this video, I am going to teach you how to say "AND" / "ALSO" in Japanese. Did you know that there are A LOT of ways to say "AND" other than "TO"? と も や とか し たり て で あと そして それに さらに

entry.title: DESU or DES? Pro Japanese Pronunciation Tips

media:group.media:title: DESU or DES? Pro Japanese Pronunciation Tips
media:group.media:description:
Support Misa on Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/japaneseammo
In this video, I am going to teach you how to improve your Japanese pronunciation.
How to correctly pronounce: - Japanese vowels (あいうえお/aiueo) - Japanese "R" sound (らりるれろ/rarirurero) - ふ (fu/hu) sound - desU or deSS? masU or maSS? - EIgo or Ēgo? (long vowels)

entry.title: Pronouns in Japanese (ANATA and KIMI are RUDE)

media:group.media:title: Pronouns in Japanese (ANATA and KIMI are RUDE)
media:group.media:description:
Support Misa on Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/japaneseammo
Pronouns and genders in Japanese
0:15 He/She 11:30 They 15:35 I 32:29 You 40:14 We
watashi, boku, ore, atashi, uchi - I anata, kimi, omae, temee, kisama - you kanojo - she kare - he karera - they
...But are they really used commonly?? (Hint: NO)
